site.title: Kitchen Escapades
site.tagline:
Less Escapades, more old recipe book.
Forgive me.

about.title: Tomas' Kitchen Escapades
about.p1: I'm freelance developer from Kaunas, Lithuania, Northern Europe ğŸ¥¶ And yes, I cook.
about.p2: I started helping in the kitchen at an early age and soon I was making simple dishes by myself.
about.p3: These days I mostly enjoy Italian ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹ and Japanese ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ cuisine, and French ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· desserts. Of course I have a soft spot for my native Lithuanian ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¹ kitchen.
about.p4: As I try new things and remember old, I try to add them here. I don't plan to get into food bloggin. However a sharable and pretty recipe book is nice to have.
about.p5: For more about me, check out my portfolio and resume at
about.p6: Or go back to main page and keep reading ğŸ˜
